column1: What day of the week was it when the Declaration of Independence was signed on July 4, 1776?
Can you guess what day of the year it is today? For example, March 5th is the 65th day of the year if it is a leap year...
What day of the week will Christmas fall on this year?
What was the day of the week when you were born?
